name: Tempo Loop
description:
Fast paced arcade game. The pointer will loop infinitely. Tap the screen when the pointer touch the mark accurately. Collect the yellow circle 'Token' to unlock special themes. Once you find the tempo, you're on fire. Beat the higher score on the leaderboard!

Features
- Single tap control casual game
- Unlock different theme
- Need timing and fast reflex
- Gamecenter leaderboard
- Minimalist design
